text: keneku visin danayak gæna ho yahapatak gæna ho janaya atara samadanayak æti kirima gæna ho karanu labana vidhanayakin misa ovun atara kerena rahas katavan bohomayaka yahapatak nomæta. kavareku eya allahge trptiya bala porottuven sidu karanne da evita api ohuta atimahat pratiphala pirinamannemu
